title: Got a leaverbuster because of a random disconnect...
body:
Hi,
I was playing late last night and randomly when i respawned I couldn't move, minions started sliding all over the place and my ping jumped up to 5000. I waited it out but it wouldn't fix itself and I couldn't close the game either to try and reconnect. My internet was otherwise fine, working on my phone and even on the same computer apart from league of legends. Woke up this morning to be slapped with a 20 min leaverbuster which I feel is pretty bs considering it's not my fault that something yourside kicked me out of the game.
Any way i could get this revoked?
